#summary Adding adverbs

= Adding adverbs  =

Adverbs are specified as modifiers in an {{{SPhraseSpec}}}.  For example, to output "John quickly ran", use:
{{{
        p.setSubject("John");
        p.setVerb("run");
        p.addModifier("quickly");
        p.setFeature(Feature.TENSE, Tense.PAST);
}}}
	or

{{{
        p.setSubject("John");
        VPPhraseSpec verb = nlgFactory.createVerbPhrase("run");
        p.setVerb(verb);
        verb.addModifier("quickly");
        p.setFeature(Feature.TENSE, Tense.PAST);
}}}

The first method will have the adverb automatically interpreted as modifying the main verb; the second method explicitly states that the adverb modifies the main verb.  Handily, both produce the same output.
